text:
We are planning to add a new action (or update existing one post evaluation).
In our current action we do have dropdown showing list of Airmeets.

Now, for the next iteration what we want to achieve is, after selecting the UI we should be able to make api calls and have custom fields in UI (for airmeet registration field vs HubSpot contact property).
Refer below image for what we wan't to achieve in HubSpot workflow.
Hey Nishank, this isn’t currently possible, but it’s on the team’s radar and it’s something that we hope to add support for in the future
Thanks for prompt response. Will convey within my team.
